title: cmd/compile/ssa: panic: unexpected nil Type
body:
Compiling this panics:

```go
package main

var s string

func f_ssa(x byte) byte {
	x = byte(1)
	var b byte = s[2]
	x = 2
	return b + x
}
```

I know that this is all WIP. Just filing this as I encounter them so that we can (1) shore up existing code as we go and (2) start building a suite of regression test cases.
